mapper.select: SELECT obc.id, obc.create_date as createDate, obc.modify_date as createDate, obc.bank_name as bankName, obc.bank_card_image as bankCardImage, obc.bk_max_amt as bkMaxAmt, obc.bk_min_amt as bkMinAmt, obc.sign, obc.data_status as dataStatus FROM dj_worker_worker_bank_card wwbc, dj_other_bank_card obc WHERE wwbc.bank_card_id = obc.id AND wwbc.bank_card_number = #{bankCardNumber} AND wwbc.worker_id = #{workerId}
